flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Propane tanks cost $20 to refill, require a trip to the store, and always run out right in the middle of big family cookouts. This guide will show you how to convert your propane grill to natural gas. It will show you how to install a gas line, too.
guide.introduction_rendered: Propane tanks cost $20 to refill, require a trip to the store, and always run out right in the middle of big family cookouts. This guide will show you how to convert your propane grill to natural gas. It will show you how to install a gas line, too.

lines.text: Replace propane tank with natural gas.
lines.text_raw: Replace propane tank with natural gas.

lines.text: See complete how-to video at HowToLou web site:
lines.text_raw: See complete how-to video at HowToLou web site:

guide.summary: Make your propane grill more convenient by converting it to run on natural gas.
guide.title: Converting a Propane Grill to Natural Gas
